attributes.additional_details:
Today the EU Commission has strongly advised the UK Government to keep reducing the deficit, though at the same time increase investment.

"The UK's deficit is expected to be 6.1% in 2012-13, "one of the highest in the EU", the commission said."

"Brussels expects the UK economy will expand by 0.5% this year, and by 1.7% in 2013. The OBR currently predicts growth of 0.8% this year, and 2% in 2013."

We must slow down the pace of the cut backs, and increase the amount of investment, so we can get more people into employment, then putting them on the dole queue!

I urge this Government to Take immediate action, to slow down the pace of cuts, and increase investment
